titleStmt.title: The secret history of K. James I and K. Charles I compleating the reigns of the four last monarchs / by the author of The secret history of K. Charles II and K. James II.
titleStmt.author: Phillips, John, 1631-1706.

notesStmt.note: "Supposed to have been written by John Phillips." -- Lowndes.
